price: 22. Kaak iyyen Atu ni-yallitteh qibaadak nee maktuh neh temeetee? Toysa nee kah xagnissa (diggaala) neh bah numma yaccee marih num tekkek.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā litafikanā ʿan ālihatinā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
